charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1101_0100_2:
While out exploring, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
heard some loud, excited shouts.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1101_0200_2:
When [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] headed in the direction of the shouting,
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across Bede and his friends.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_0300_1:
Gloria. You were truly trying to take us out,
weren’t you.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_0400_1:
Weren’t you doing the same, Bede? You had a
serious look on your face!
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_0401_0600_1:
Oh, you’re here! I guess you heard the shouting
earlier, huh.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_0900_1: We all came here to do some special training.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_1000_1:
Bede and Gloria started a battle to warm
up, but...
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_1100_1: they kept getting more and more serious.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_1200_1:
Yeah! I had a feeling it might get competitive,
since I was battling Bede.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_1300_1: I simply won’t allow myself to lose, either.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_1400_1:
Articuno is prideful and elegant. Defeat doesn’t
suit it one bit.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_1500_1:
Hm? That look in your eyes... You want to know
more about me and Articuno, don’t you.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_1600_1:
Very well. I don’t usually do this, but I’ll make an
exception and explain.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_1700_1:
I met Articuno while training in the Crown Tundra
back in Galar.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_1800_1:
I’d hoped to catch it, but as I made my approach,
it made copies of itself and started toying with me!
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_1900_1:
Of course, I’m not one to be made a fool of, so I
couldn’t help but take offense.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_2000_1:
I chased it all over the Crown Tundra until it
finally acknowledged me.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_2100_1: What is it? I can tell you want to say something.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_0402_2500_1:
Oh, you’ve noticed too? Yes, we both have a bit
of class to us. We’re exactly the same in that way.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_2600_1:
Because we’re so similar, we make a pretty strong
sync pair together!
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_2800_1: Articuno has become a reliable partner Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_2900_1:
And since it’s a Psychic-type Pokémon,
not a Fairy type...
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_3000_1:
this is a chance for my potential to grow
even more!
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_3100_1: Before I was scouted by the old lady...
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_3200_1: I mostly battled with just Psychic-type Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_3300_1: Yeah, I remember! You did do that at first!
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_3400_1:
Now that I’ve mastered Fairy-type Pokémon, my
next goal is to master Psychic types, too!
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_3500_1:
I see... If you do that, you’ll be even harder
to beat.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_3600_1:
Once I’ve mastered both types, I’ll be invincible!
Nobody will be able to defeat me!
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_3700_1: You two won’t even stand a chance.
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_3800_1:
Oh yeah? Well, we’re gonna train hard and get
just as strong as you!
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_3900_1: And then we’ll have another serious battle!
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_4000_1:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], you’d do well to
remember this, too...
charaepi_ch0246_90_beet/2301_1201_4100_1: WE’RE the sync pair you should strive to beat!
